example.text: If the US doesn't raise the debt ceiling, the country could default on its debts and cause thousands of job layoffs. But MAGA Republicans would rather hurt working-class American families than force billionaires to pay their fair share. I spoke about it on the House floor. [[url]]

First responders protect our health and keep our communities safe. They deserve to have the most modern and effective equipment possible. My bill would make sure they have it. Thanks to [[user]] for his help as we work to pass this bipartisan safety measure. [[url]]
It includes caps on insulin payments to $35 for all Americans. It restores the enhanced child tax credit and provides up to $3,600 per family per child.
Mr. Speaker, I thank the gentlewoman from Florida for the opportunity to speak here tonight. As I knew before, I have just learned again, you should not follow any speaker with the last name Jackson.

Today, I had a great meeting with Nat Moghe, Rex Reid and Peomelia Tony-Boss. They are constituents from Roselle who are activists for Family Values @ Work and NJ Citizens Action. We talked about the importance of paid leave and childcare. [[user]] [[url]]
I met with the Jewish Community Relations Council today. These students wanted to discuss US policies regarding Israel and the relationship between the two countries. [[url]]

Our railroad workers risked their health and safety to keep the country going during COVID-19. But the railroad industry denied them paid sick leave to care for their own health. My bill would give these critical workers the paid sick leave they deserve! [[url]]
